Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or operations. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $14,000 for this product. This offer reflects our commitment to providing high-quality products while also considering the value you place on it. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
